description.value: Has a hidden storage that can fit one item no larger than a closed fist. Discovery requires a -10 Search Test, or a +10 Search test if using a Medical scanner or Auspex

system.benefit: Has a hidden storage that can fit one item no larger than a closed fist. Discovery requires a -10 Search Test, or a +10 Search test if using a Medical scanner or Auspex

specialAbilities.name: Hidden Compartment
specialAbilities.description: You have a concealed cavity in your body that can hide small objects. Searches have -30 to detect hidden items.
